resources.string:
"Due to limitations of the Wear OS platform, the app cannot grant permission to access files.
You need to do this manually.

1. Connect to the watch via ADB
2. Run the following command:
adb shell appops set --uid com.dertefter.wearfiles MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE allow
3. Restart the app

I'm very sorry that you have to deal with such inconvenience, but this is the only way to make the app work."
This file already exists.\nDo you want to overwrite it?
Try to grant permission without PC
